website_summaries.verdict: This popular 4-piece set offers a variety of bag sizes for a low price.
pros: The ultra-lightweight construction of this set makes for easy carrying
Buyers appreciate the various color options
cons: Not the best pick for international trips because they tend to be less durable than pricier options

customer_reviews.title: Items seemed previously used or made cheap
customer_reviews.text: The suitcases themselves appeared great at first glance. After examinations there were multiple tears and usage signs in the inside. It seems cheaply made and I'll be returning in fear of quick breakdown
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M

customer_reviews.title: Not durable enough to actually use as luggage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this luggage set in January 2019 for a business trip I had planned for overseas in the middle of the month. Six total flight legs, round trip. The zipper on the large suitcase (which was not packed heavily and was not therefore under any zipper strain at all) burst open on the last leg of the trip, so after 29 hours of travel I was greeted by a pile of my clothes spilling out on the luggage-claim conveyor. Bonus, a gift that I had brought home for my wife had fallen out and was nowhere to be found. I've returned these and will be buying something that's actually durable for my next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Cael Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Looks can be deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: As a lover of american touristster products and growing up with them this set disappointed me. This set is very cheaply built. Walmart had a 4 peice A.T. set nearly identical for only 14 more dollars and it was better quality. Fabric was thicker, sewn better, and the handle bars were 5 times sturdier. The walmart set 25 inch was also a spinner, which this set isn't, and came with the rolling duffel. Plus the lining on the inside covered the entire inside and zips shut. This set the liner is a flimsy badly sewn piece of fabric with a few Velcro squares to hold it down.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lee

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice set for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice first set for my husband and I. Lots of pockets on the 25" and 21". The duffle bag does not have the extended handle. The tote does hold a lot of accessories/toiletries etc.
customer_reviews.author: CINDYBELLE

customer_reviews.title: A good set of luggage
customer_reviews.text: A good set of luggage. My biggest issue was that the duffel does not have a handle for rolling. It has wheels, but no retractable handle. My last set did and this was a surprise (and makes the bag much less useful). Otherwise, I have been happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Guy Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Duffle bag has no extendable handle!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and nice set except the duffle doesn’t have an extendable handle. I’m only 5’6” and took the duffle to the airport. If I turned it on it’s end to roll behind me I had to lean over sideways to stablize it to roll since my arm isn’t long enough to keep it on the ground. Was a pain in the ass trying to do that and also handle the carryon bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These seem like good quality luggage. Only the larger one comes fully lined. I ended up returning this set because the big one was too big for our needs. Bought 2 sets of the 3pc instead. This is how we planned on stacking them for our road trip, just so you can get an idea of sizing. -duffle is empty.
customer_reviews.author: Missiz B

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Road Trip Luggage Set
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described. The only thing that was different was the shade of blue on the set I ordered. Blue set is a little darker than picture online but I actually liked it much better. Great luggage for road trips! Only thing I wish was different is the fact these pieces of 2 wheels instead of 4. I wish they had 4 swivel wheels, but that’s just me being knit picky. For the price you can’t beat this set. It’s a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: ChelVee

customer_reviews.title: As I expected I'm satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a three on durability because I've not went anywhere yet to test how reliable/durable it is. There are some reviews I see that are bad. But from my experience. EVERYTHING was new as you would expect. I am happy right now. If I remember. I'll give a update once I go and return from out of town next month. Hopefully it will withstand whatever airports and planes throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: Marquis

customer_reviews.title: You just can't beat this price. It's lightweight and lasts forever.
customer_reviews.text: Twenty years ago, on a Black Friday, I found a 4 piece set of American Tourister on sale for $79.00. This luggage has lasted all this time except for the largest suitcase which was used the most. This Black Friday, I was lucky enough to find an updated version of what I have for $59.00. This set will last me the rest of my life. I still have the 3 remaining pieces from the old set, (that matches), so now I have a 7 piece set all in black that will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: judith moore

customer_reviews.title: Great set for my teen but beware of warehouse deals.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, great price. Only complaint would be that it was warehouse purchase marked as item repackaged and no mention that the suitcase corner was crushed. The soonest a replacement could be sent was 6 days after my daughter left so my husband had to take a mallet to reshape the suitcase so it could stand up. Disappointed that it was shipped out like this and the lack of customer service. I gave the set 5 stars because it’s a great set at this price point!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dudley

customer_reviews.title: For what I paid, I’m happy.
customer_reviews.text: Zippers have broken on two of them and the level to pull the biggest one keeps getting stuck when I try to bring it to its highest level. All in all, for what I paid, I wasn’t expecting the best quality ever so I’m still pleased. The do roll well. Color has already faded a bit but I didn’t need anything fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke on second use
customer_reviews.text: Zipper came apart when I checked-in the 21" suitcase on a flight (second time using the suitcase). On the baggage belt at my destination, the contents were spilling out. I cannot recommend this suitcase. Because I'm 1 month beyond the return window, I would have to pay shipping to have it repaired by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: DB-AZ

customer_reviews.title: travel for cheap
customer_reviews.text: Bags seem to be good quality for the price. While the bags might not last us a lifetime, they should last quite a few years. We travel mostly by car, rather than plane. So I have no concern about the bags being thrown around, etc. If you're considering these bags, and you travel by car also, then you can't go wrong with these affordable bags.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: for the price this set is amazing. very nice sizes and everything we need. plus i love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby palmer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: I already own couple of AT bags for 6+ years. This 4pcs set price is low, I thought the model is outdated so the brand is giving an offer on the product. The truth is it is low quality, I didn't expect this from AT. None of the bag has lining inside, means you can see the handle rod, wheels, and the plastic inside. The backside doesn't have hard support, it is just the cloth, I don't think it will withstand the harsh handling of airlines. In transit anybody can easily poke the backside and take whatever inside. The duffel bag has wheels but no long pulling handles, I don't know what is the purpose of the wheels then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good brand reputation
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product based on the price and product reputation. The bags are sturdy and well constructed with features that are needed when traveling. I used the larger bag for a recent trip and found the piece held up well during air travel. Each bag stores itself within the large bag. Definitely glad I found this on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Great Light weight luggage
customer_reviews.text: Received my luggage yesterday. I haven't had the chance to use it yet. That will be in about a week. I have had luggage very similar to this before and had great success with it. Now, of course, I'm not a full time traveler and pretty sure that will make a difference. If you are a light traveler, then this should be sufficient for you. If you travel all the time, then some more sturdy would be more appropriate
customer_reviews.author: Kick Mom

customer_reviews.title: Too too small.
customer_reviews.text: The sizes are deceiving in the photos. They are too small. Really its a big disappointment. Unfortunately i was teavelling so i could not see until i was back and by then the return window had closed. Money gone waste. Quality is cheap. Seems like previously used. Many tears in the big suitcase. Will claim the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Shoaib Chohan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of traveling and I wanted a nice set to travel with. However, this one let me down. It seemed very cheap. I took one look and sent it back within the hour of arrival. I was disappointed in a brand that I thought had a good reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Danna Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Generally good and economical luggage set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set more less as a "backup" luggage set. These are not spinners and have basic design features. Nothing fancy about this luggage set. Time will tell if they will withstand the abuse on the road but I did not notice anything that is cheap quality. Overall is a good starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Trang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: I arrived back from my trip 1 day after the return date, so I contacted American Tourister directly. The 21" suitcase has a zipper that jams every time! NO RESPONSE TO MY COMPLAINT. Typical for an Amazon vendor.
customer_reviews.author: grlgonewild

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are a great buy. I’ve used them on 2 separate trips and they have held up fine. They are easy to store too. They fit inside of each other.
customer_reviews.author: Dawna

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage. We had samsonite luggage but needed another ...
customer_reviews.text: Great luggage. We had samsonite luggage but needed another couple sets now that the family has grown and I would say these are similar in every way. A little bit lighter in weight compared to samsonite.
customer_reviews.author: Srwils

customer_reviews.title: Not too sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set before I took a quick trip. The duffle bag is a nice size, but I don't understand why it has wheels??? You would have to be under 4' to pull it using the wheels, there is no extension handle. Coming back, I had to check in my luggage due to no room in the overhead compartments on the plane. I know the airlines are rough on luggage, but the carry-on piece got a rip on the backside. It's very thin material. I have traveled for decades and this is the first time I got this type of damage on my first use. Luggage isnt too strong.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne ferrari

customer_reviews.title: American Tourister Fieldbrook XLT 4pc Set
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our grandchildren for an upcoming trip. Checked them out when they were delivered. Zippers worked smoothly even around the corners. The wheels moved across the floor easily with just enough space the luggage didn't drag on the floor. Grandchildren said they worked great and were happy to get and use them. Would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R

customer_reviews.title: The items are “USED”
customer_reviews.text: Like the video and the picture shows ...the description was saying before I purchased it that it was “NEW” clearly as shown in the audio it’s not NEW...(BAD DEAL) if I hadn’t read ALL the reviews I wouldn’t have purchased this set...
customer_reviews.author: Alice Smalls

customer_reviews.title: Ripped apart on first flight
customer_reviews.text: A section of the outer pouch ripped off during the very first flight. Now there is an exposed hole to the main section of the luggage. I'm sure the airport did the damage but didn't notice it until already left the airport however luggage should last more than one flight. Spend your money wisely and buy something better. These are are not durable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Monday

customer_reviews.title: New Travel Luggage
customer_reviews.text: Looked for replacement luggage for my worn out traveling suit cases. These are a low price but so far for one trip have been perfect for me. The Smaller bag does fit in the over head and the small carry bag fits under the seat. For the price and hope to get two years if not more out of them they will more than paid for them self multiple time.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed in the size of the biggest suitcase but I guess I should have measured my old one I have first to make sure it was the same size. The largest one is a great size for one person for a week and the others seem to be a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Love the set. Love the red because it’s easier to see when getting luggage. My only issue is that it’s not too resistant to weight. My carry on was like 15 lbs and when stood upright, it would fall over constantly. I store my tablet in the front pocket so having to watch my luggage and position it just right was a bit irritating. Other than that easy to use. Wheels would put up a little resistance when maneuvering sideways but nothing too difficult. Only second time using this set(will update after next two work trips).
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Great for light travelling.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them to go on my vacation to Jamaica this summer. It survived the trip to and fro. Still intact.
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN T BACCHUS

customer_reviews.title: Biggest suitcase had a cut in fabric on back. ...
customer_reviews.text: Biggest suitcase had a cut in fabric on back. Held up ok on flight though. Duffel bag and smaller upright were both able to be used as carry on.
customer_reviews.author: amapratt

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage and Value
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time we've purchased this American Tourister set. We've found you can spend twice as much on other luggage that won't last any longer. The airlines are still going to abuse them. This set holds up well. One negative is the plastic on the interior degrades over time and becomes brittle. Most luggage today comes with the spinner wheels. We actually prefer the two roller blade type wheels. The larger wheels roll much easier, especially over rough surfaces. We'll continue buying this American Tourister set.
customer_reviews.author: PastorBR

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Rolling duffle has no purpose unless you are a child as it has no pull up handle and you’d have to bend down 3 ft to pull it. Also the wheels on the 21” and 25” do not pivot so it’s very unwieldy when getting on and off elevator. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Luggage disappointment note
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to return my luggage after not being able to undue one of the zippers. After filling the case to the brim, I actually got the zipper to work. Hope to use this luggage for a long time. Must note, the lining isn't as nice as in my previous American Tourister luggage. Guess that is how they can lower price and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen White

customer_reviews.title: Perfect last minute solution for family beach trip! Awesome Price!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bag for my wife, son, and myself. This package covered us and then some. The bags were all nested within one another, so I received everything all in one nicely packed box. Suitcases have wheels on them, which made loading and unloading the car, and transporting to and from the hotel a piece of cake. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Jam35Gr3g0ry

customer_reviews.title: A little deceiving
customer_reviews.text: From the picture on Amazon it looks like the luggage had four wheels. When they arrived the bigger ones only have two and the duffle bag has none. Duffle bags can get pretty heavy. It would've been nice if it had wheels. I almost sent them back but decided to live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Merrifield

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: We have owned several American Tourister suitcases and we have always been happy with them. We have several that are at least 30 years old and are still holding up fairly well. But we were ready to purchase a new set, so of course we bought American Tourister again. This time we are not very happy! The stitching tore out along the top edge on our very first time using it and it was already too late to return it. Not happy with this purchase at all!
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: We loved it
customer_reviews.text: So far we only used these for a one road trip. But we were in and out of places the whole week. My trunk was packed like a true Tetris lover😊. The luggage looks great and suited our needs perfectly. No problems with wheels, no problems with zippers (even when the bag was stuffed full). We are very happy with it & can't wait to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang for your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to add to our family collection and I have to say I was really impressed with the quality and the sizes of the luggage. When we aren’t using them they all fit into the large suitcase for easy storage. This was definitely a really good bank for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Spinella

customer_reviews.title: Ground travel maybe, definitely not flight worthy.
customer_reviews.text: Got luggage for Disney vacation. Zipper broke in transit. Lost my TSA lock and much of the contents. Bag arrived to Disney duct taped back together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect suitcases for traveling, I use the small bag and the small suitcase for a week long road trip with my friends, and I was able to fit all the clothes that I needed into that bag which says that it's only a two to three day bag. I like said it's small enough that it fits on the plane and can be considered your carry on and the small bag is considered your personal item so I didn't have to pay checked bag fees.
customer_reviews.author: Jstbloved

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I may have misread the description, but I thought I was getting suitcases with 4 wheels. These only had two, which made it a little more difficult for my children to maneuver through the airports. Other than that small inconvenience, the quality is excellent, they are light weight, and the price was far better than I was finding in local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Delatte

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Love my new suitcases! I purchased these in purple so that I can easily distinguish mine from the thousand black suitcases coming down the chute. Love that there are three sizes and know that they will be well used. A bargain for the money! Happy travels!
customer_reviews.author: MaryE Patalano

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and weight of the luggage. It handles alright but, can be better. I was very disappointed with the quality of the suitcase. I used it once on my trip to Mexico and when I arrived home I saw a tear at the corner. I inspected the suitcase and saw it was coming apart at the seam. It opened up at the corner about 3 inches. I had to take it in for repairs. I understand I got a good deal on the price but, that doesn't mean you should skimp on the quality. It really should last more than one trips worth.
customer_reviews.author: LILLIAN HOBBS

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up as you would expect being an American Tourister.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets of the American Tourister as it is known as an excellent product and the price was affordable. This product has not held up. Purchased in March of 2019 and used a handful of times. Both of our large suitcases look like they are years old. One has a hole in the back where the inside support piece has punctured it and the other the front is all frayed and fabric has pulled out of the front pocket along with zippers not working on the pockets. Very disappointed in this product. Product says is comes with a 10 limited warranty but the warranty doesn't cover anything. Will not be purchasing an American Tourister product again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I received a blue set for my graduation from college 4 years ago and love it! We don't travel a ton but I would say we fly and use the large suitcase at least once a year and the smaller ones regularly. I encouraged my fiance to register for this black set so we could each have one and he is very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Zipper on carry on bag
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the carry-on bag. First time I used it the zippers came off at the ends because there’s no metal piece across the bottom of the zipper to keep it from coming off I like the bag I just don’t like that I have no zippers to keep it closed :(
customer_reviews.author: Elanie

customer_reviews.title: Not great for long term.
customer_reviews.text: We went on vacation in December and got to use them brand new. Our flight there, thh looked pretty beat up. On our flight back, the handle wouldn’t lift up when we got it from baggage claim. It’s now broken so we tossed it. It’s not very sturdy or long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa S

customer_reviews.title: Okay set
customer_reviews.text: This was a okay set and holds up well but not big enough for a family trip. We bought this for our family cruise and ended up buy two for to go with it. I would say great for 2 people max.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Brand name quality
customer_reviews.text: Well having a back injury I bought this to use on my return flight-overestimated myself. This is not as sturdy as the one I have at home 15 years old but will do. Now to be able to fly home once this pandemic is over.
customer_reviews.author: Ypsi_chick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful luggage set
customer_reviews.text: I like shades of blue, so the blue is beautiful. I purchased the 4 piece set. I was pleased to see how roomy and durable the luggage is. I purchased it in Nov 2019 and have already used it on 3 trips. American Tourister Fieldbrook XLT is a great brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I love these bags except for one wish list thing
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags except for one wish list thing... the wheels should be further apart. It wanted to twist and turn too easily in my opinion. But the bags themselves are very lightweight and and the handles pop right out, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ditto

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece. The luggage has a great look to it! Sturdiness I’d say is prob average. I feel this luggage is for travelers that don’t necessarily fly all the time. The airlines can be hard on suit cases and I’m not sure how they would hold up from that. I do feel these are perfect for road trips or places you carry and handle yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Shop the price..it changes drastically.
customer_reviews.text: We have two sets. a 3 pcs & a 4 pcs. I drive a VW Tiguan, the smaller rolling bag fits perfectly behind the front seat, they almost seem to be designed that why do to how they fit, the larger bag fits perfectly in the trunk..two fit side by side w/room for the shoulder bag in between.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Lightweight & Cheap Construction for Airline Travel
customer_reviews.text: With this set of luggage, American Tourister gives new meaning to cheap and you get what you pay for. Fieldbrook set is probably fine for a car trip to Grand Ma's but there is no way the lightweight and flimsy construction would hold up to the rigors of air travel. The shipping container it was shipped in was more sturdy and robust than the luggage. Paper-thin fabric, flimsy frame structure and closure zippers you wouldn't find on a cheap pair of jeans. Being returned to Amazon today.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: As I suspected, these are extremely lightweight (not a bad thing for the most part). The box arrived damaged and I wasn't confident in the durability of the luggage. I'll definitely look at a higher price point going forward.
customer_reviews.author: btlemily

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these when my bag broke on my way to Hawaii. Arrived quickly and shipping was free with Prime. The bags nest inside each other so they take up minimal storage space. They are very lightweight but so far they have held up okay.
customer_reviews.author: M. Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat getting 5 pieces of luggage for this price, especially since I took a one way trip overseas and might have to use them for a good long time. Great value, durable and worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this set when I got it. Now i'm in florida with a huge check back that the zipper broke on. Bag was not even close to tight. Only weighted 40lbs. Didn't even have the extension unzipped. First time using it. Just bought it. Now i can't zip it shut and have to get back to texas.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last minute for a family vaction being a mom of three i found good use for all the pieces the two bigger ones come with wheels and handles the duffle bag has wheels but no handles and the bag is similar ti the duffle bag but has no wheels over all great set the kids were opeaning and closeing like crazy and there was no problem with the zippers
customer_reviews.author: alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Super Small
customer_reviews.text: These are NOTHING like what it shows in the pictures. They are SUPER small and will not work for what we need them for! Such a disappointment and waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Am@zon $hopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice luggage for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift at Christmas for a family member who travels throughout the year for his job. So far, this set has held up and performs nicely. I'll update later if needed, but this was a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon In Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Good product and looks good
customer_reviews.text: The luggage is very nice looking. Perfect amount of space for what we needed. The handles are a bit cheap because one of them bent (won't close) before the trip was over. Still worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Not the best flying luggage
customer_reviews.text: If you are using this luggage to travel on land, it’s perfect. If you are traveling by plane, this luggage isn’t durable at all. I flew once round trip, both direct flight and my luggage looks as if it’s made 5 trips instead of one.
customer_reviews.author: Ally M

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set initially for a trip, but have since used all of the luggage while traveling back and forth out of town a couple of times a month. Haven't had any issues with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Madisha

customer_reviews.title: Don't over-stuff and you're good
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for the first trip, but I'd advise not to try to over stuff them at all because the seams start to tare. Is an excellent buy if you get them on a black Friday deal like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This luggage will be used for a traveling home care nurse. The nursing bags that other companies have are not big enough and the prices are ridiculous. Excellent Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: It came is good condition,I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I like how it was packed so that there is only one suitcase incapsulating the entire set. Which is an easy way to store the luggage. I loved the color and the set. They just called me to find out if I liked the luggage and I told them I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine product
customer_reviews.text: These bags are fine. The rolling duffle is quite short (I'm not a tall person and I'd have to hunch over to use it) It's not super durable, but not bad for the price. I also didn't like that wheels only run one way. I like the ones they swivel.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Zipper
customer_reviews.text: Zipper Broke packing for first trip. Didn’t even make it out of the house. Furious.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: NO name tag/slot
customer_reviews.text: NO name tag nor slot on these suit cases!!! Very surprising -- Who would make suit cases with NO name tag/slot?? Zippers tend to hang-up in corners. Where has AMERICAN quality and design gone??? (to China). These suit cases should be renamed CHINA TOURISTER!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rooster

customer_reviews.title: Good for one trip
customer_reviews.text: Lasted one trip from US to Thailand. They didn't completely wear out but they took a beating and it shows. I gave my sets away and came home empty. I don't think they would have lasted if they took the same beating.
customer_reviews.author: The0ne

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother with this set
customer_reviews.text: Luggage was terrible. Handle was broke on one piece & the carry on was another color from the set! Sent the crap back
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Not wow but ok
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy this for my urgent travel. This seems like an OK set that is a bit overpriced. Neither junk nor premium..I wish I could give it a 3.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shas

customer_reviews.title: No telescoping handle on the duffle bacg
customer_reviews.text: I guess it was my fault for not noticing the duffle bag only has a nylon strap for a handle. Very disappointing. Now I have to carry it or drag it by the strap and walk hunched over. Don't know how I missed that. Do not have time to return it but I will wont order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: can't speak to durability. but, it will only need to survive a one-way trip ;)
customer_reviews.author: DJ Slade

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a week travel
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sized suitcases for a weeks travel. I used the larger one and my teenage son used the middle sized one and the travel made a nice carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Despite some the the low reviews here, the suitcases feel much more sturdy than the other suitcase set that I got. My husband loved the duffel bag, and immediately claimed it for himself. My family will be using it for our upcoming trip in November, and I am confident that it will hold up just five.
customer_reviews.author: ckaja

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all. They’re very flimsy and not the best of quality, for the price it’s mediocre but not what I expected at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The photo says it all nothing. It’s hard to give a review when nothing came. So I gave a one star for everything, it’s disappointing to buy something and have it not show up.
customer_reviews.author: Nobacan

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I traveled the pull handle broke on my largest bag. My small bag got a hole in it because the material isn't very durable. I'll have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last a round trip. Handle jammed at the airport and I couldn't get it to collapse. Had to force it closed and couldn't get it to reopen. Had to buy a new suitcase for my return trip. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Magee

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Love the set. Great quality and great price. High quality items at an affordable price. Fast shipping on time for our Disney trip! Thank u
customer_reviews.author: Harvest Collections

customer_reviews.title: Not very Durable in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Jan 2019 for Alaska cruise in July 2019. Used large suitcase and small one. Large one ripped at the outside zipper seam .This was first and only time used.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: I got this suitcase set for a week long trip. The suitcases all performed wonderfully and they still look brand new. The largest suitcase has a plastic stopper on the bottom which acts as a handle for when you want to pick up and set up your suitcase. I was able to pack everything that I needed and still had room to bring extra things home.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten Kreider

customer_reviews.title: Seem decent
customer_reviews.text: Seem nice, time will tell. I'm just pleased to have something other than duffle bags for teens to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: adutt

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell but good use
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this it had a heavy chemical smell that passed in a few days. My daughter needed this for college tours. It was perfect didn’t break up. Overstuffed a few a bit still in tact so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ntorrence

customer_reviews.title: I don't travel much so I didn't want to pay ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't travel much so I didn't want to pay a fortune for a set that was only going to be used 3 or 4 times every year. So far, after 4 flights, it's given me no trouble. I've used American Tourister brand before when I flew oversees and it withstood traveling up and down Italy for ten days then continued to last me about 7 years after that.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the luggage. The duffel and other bag is small. However, the luggage and hand carry works fine. I was really in need of luggage so i purchased it and they didnt disappoint me. I put as much clothes as i could and thw lugggage supported finely. No damage first travel. Im happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Yangzum

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: The pull out handle did not work or engage and was very disappointed. I used them without returning because we left for vacation that week and had no other luggage. Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Sherry fetcher

customer_reviews.title: DECEPTION OF THE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I THOUGHT THAT THE SUITCASES TO TRAVEL HAVE 4 WHEELS AND ONLY HAVE 2 WHEELS.
customer_reviews.author: JUAN CARLOS CANALES

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: These suitcases work for what I need. They are very basic and the cases themselves are not super “hard” In terms of sturdiness but it works perfect. They are the appropriate sizes I needed for traveling. Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Beautuful set. Will last for years. I am very pleased with the quality of this set. Beautiful color and plenty of pockets for packing various items.
customer_reviews.author: TANYA RAGNONE

customer_reviews.title: Good Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because the price was great and it looked good. I stuffed this set with all my clothes and shoes for a cross country move. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: advertised as a good set of luggage. Quality is poor and I wouldn't rely on using it on a flight. only 2 pieces are usable. I would return but there is a substantial return fee.
customer_reviews.author: hinda friedman

customer_reviews.title: Love my Suitcases
customer_reviews.text: Was weary....But I am so very pleased with them. First set I have ever owned .
customer_reviews.author: Sue Carter

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn't pay close enough attention to the measurements. Two of the bags are carry on size. Only one fully size bag. The extra little bag should be good for organization. Hopefully it holds up when tsa and the baggage handlers starts throwing it around
customer_reviews.author: R. Small

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: These 3 pieces were a fabulous deal and shipped overnight at Christmas with no shipping fee. OUTSTANDING purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bridgit J Fitzgerald

product_meta.title: American Tourister Fieldbrook XLT Softside Upright Luggage, Red/Black, 4-Piece Set (BB/DF/21/25)
product_meta.description: Size:4-Piece Set (BB/DF/21/25)| Color:Red/BlackThis American Tourister Set is made of ultra-lightweight 600D shiny polyester construction. Rolls upright so there is no weight on your arm or shoulder, uprights have smooth-rolling in-line skate wheels for effortless mobility. Features reinforced corners defend against the harshest travel conditions and multiple interior and exterior pockets keep you well organized. Push-button locking handle is designed to fit comfortably in your hand.
feature_bullets: UPRIGHTS have smooth rolling in line skate wheels for effortless mobility
MULTIPLE interior and exterior pockets keep you well organized
PUSH BUTTON locking handle is designed to fit comfortably in your hand
REINFORCED corners defend against the harshest travel conditions
INCLUDES Boarding Bag: 10"H x 15"W x 6.5"D, Wheeled Duffel: 11.5"H x 23"W x 12"D, 21" Upright: 21"H x 14"W x 7"D, 25" Upright: 25"H x 16.5"W x 8"D

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,537 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
